page.title: 09Children's Day.Haxby Road.
page.content:
A day in the life of a class of 24 nine year olds. Time keeping and eating habits.
Thirteen children got up between 6 a.m. and 6 45 a.m.,five got up between 7 a.m. and 7.30 a.m., and the rest between 7 45 a.m. and 8 a.m. For breakfast three children had just a drink,one child had egg and toast, two children had nothing,and the rest had cereals. All walked to school and all arrived before school started. Fourteen had crisps or a chocolate bar for break,three had a piece of fruit. Four had dinner at school,ten had a packed lunch at school and ten went home for a sandwich.
